list_definition.definition: an alcoholic drink mixed from various spirits etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A bloody Mary is a cocktail made from tomato juice, vodka, and Worcester sauce.

list_definition.definition: a mixed dish of a number of things
